line_1: Prompt to persuade, expostulate and warn,
line_2: Their hope in Heav'n, servility their scorn,

line_1: The last from specious snares shall warn,

line_2: Of Sons to thee, hereafter born,

line_1: How fatal trifles prove, let story warn.
line_2: But those who will not by instruction learn,

line_1: And double Courts the bold Intruder warn.
line_2: Fair verdant Avenues the House adorn;
